alert.note: Alert for Northern Berrien; Southern Berrien (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 15 at 11:56AM EST until January 17 at 11:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM EST WEDNESDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST TUESDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT NOON EST TODAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 10 to 25 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. * WHERE...Northern Berrien and Southern Berrien Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 11 AM EST Wednesday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 1 PM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling.
